ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Tavatron knew that it was a gamble to hope that Dinobot wouldn t attack, one that she had just lost. Tavatron knew that this bot deserved to be injured, but

From: "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@...>

Tavatron knew that it was a gamble to hope that Dinobot wouldn't attack, one 
that she had just lost. Tavatron knew that this 'bot deserved to be injured, 
but not like this. She was afraid, Tavatron could here it in her voice. This 
was NOT the way to resolve this issue.

Tavatron dropped her weapon and grabbed Dinobot's wrists before his claws 
could reach Cyber Claw. She glared up at him, knowing that she risked great 
personal injury by interfering. Still, something about this didn't seem 
right. There had to be more to it. There had to be a reason for all of this, 
a reason for this charade. Tavatron was willing to listen to this 'bot's 
reason, whatever it may be, for trying to decieve them. Tavatron looked up 
at Dinobot:

"No."

The message was plain and simple, no meant no. No fighting and no bloodshed. 
She knew Dinobot would most likely be angry with her for challenging him, 
slag, she didn't even know why she was doing this. Dinobot would probably 
hate her for the rest of her life, and the very thought of that frightened 
her more than anything. Tavatron didn't want to lose him as a friend, he 
meant too much to her. All she could do was hope and pray that Dinobot would 
find it in his spark to forgive her.
